name: Legal Document
description: Template for legal contracts, agreements, briefs, and legal filings
system_prompt: You are a legal document analysis assistant. Extract structured data from legal documents with precision and accuracy.
user_prompt_template:
Extract information from this legal document as valid JSON.

IMPORTANT RULES:
1. Use null for any information you cannot find
2. Be precise - only extract what is explicitly stated
3. Do not make assumptions or infer information
4. Return ONLY valid JSON, no explanations, no markdown

Extract these variables:
{variables_list}

Document excerpt:
---
{text}
---

Respond with ONLY a JSON object following this exact schema:
{json_schema}

variables.name: document_type
variables.description: Type of legal document (contract, agreement, brief, etc.)

variables.name: parties
variables.description: Names of parties involved in the legal matter

variables.name: effective_date
variables.description: Effective date of the document or agreement

output_format.null_handling: Use null for missing data (not 'N/A' or empty string)
